title: Implementation of AI-Driven Cybersecurity Solution
objective: To deploy a state-of-the-art AI-driven cybersecurity solution that improves detection rates and enhances defense mechanisms against advanced phishing attacks and other sophisticated cyber threats, ensuring the safety and security of organizational data and infrastructure.
kpis: Reduction in phishing incidents by 50% within 6 months
User satisfaction score over 4 out of 5
risks: Inadequate user training leading to poor adoption
High false positive rates affecting productivity
Compliance risks with data protection laws
Evolving cyber threats outpacing system updates
